children.text: There is building debris, rocks and dirt within the stormwater system.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3500.3 Plumbing and Drainage Part 3: Stormwater drainage requires in section 6.3.1.2 Site stormwater pipes, that
‘Pipes for site stormwater drains shall be cleaned internally prior to installation and commissioning’.
The pits and pipes will need to be cleared of these excesses to present a functioning stormwater system that is clear from any/all obstruction.
